Experts suggest it's a strategic move to counter China's influence and pressure India on trade, rather than a reflection of Pakistan's immediate hydrocarbon potential.       <title><![CDATA[PB Fintech Q1 Results | Net profit jumps 40% to ₹85 crore; insurance premium surges 36%]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/pb-fintech-share-price-q1-results-net-profit-jumps-40-to-rs-85-crore-insurance-premium-surges-36-19646950.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[PB Fintech reported a total insurance premium of ₹6,616 crore for the first quarter, marking a 36% year-on-year growth, driven primarily by a 65% increase in online new health insurance. Core insurance revenue rose 37% year-on-year, while core credit revenue declined by 22%. Shares of PB Fintech Ltd ended at ₹1,812.45, down by ₹9.95 or 0.55% on the BSE.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Thu, 31 Jul 2025 22:18:03 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Jomy Jos Pullokaran</dc:creator>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>

    </item>

      <description><![CDATA[PayPal has announced a new platform called ‘PayPal World’ to link several major payment systems and digital wallets. The initial partners include Mercado Pago, NPCI International Payments Limited (which operates UPI), PayPal, Tenpay Global, and Venmo. Together, they cover an estimated two billion users worldwide.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Conversational AI platform Gupshup has raised over $60 million from Globespan Capital Partners and EvolutionX Debt Capital to boost product innovation and expand across high-growth markets including India, the Middle East, Latin America, and Africa.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[UK competition watchdog proposes ‘Strategic Market Status’ designation for Apple and Google mobile platforms]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/uk-cma-strategic-market-status-apple-google-mobile-platforms-19642333.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Once designated, the CMA can impose conditions on the two big tech firms to change anticompetitive behaviour. The rules also require the companies to inform the CMA of mergers even if they do not meet notification thresholds under competition rules.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Wed, 23 Jul 2025 20:53:03 +0530]]></pubDate>
